summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Care Off fields functionality for Cash orders. All core requirements successfully verified - Care Off fields appear correctly for Cash orders, are properly hidden for Company orders, accept valid input, integrate with backend APIs, and support form submission.

minor_issues.issue: Returns status 200 instead of 201 for successful creation

passed_tests: Care Off text field appears in Costs & Charges section for Cash orders
Care Off Amount number field appears in Costs & Charges section for Cash orders
Care Off and Care Off Amount fields do NOT appear for Company orders
Care Off field accepts text input and stores correctly
Care Off Amount field accepts numeric input and stores correctly
Form submission works with Care Off fields filled
Form submission works with Care Off fields empty (optional fields)
Backend API accepts and stores care_off and care_off_amount fields
Fields are properly positioned in Costs & Charges section after Advance Amount
Fields have proper labels and placeholders
Field validation works correctly (number field for amount)
Backend API CRUD operations work with Care Off fields
Care Off fields can be updated via API
Invalid Care Off amount validation works (422 error for invalid data)
Care Off fields are optional and can be null
Backend accepts Care Off fields for both cash and company orders
Integration between frontend and backend confirmed working
